product_name: Nite Ize Sport Safety Vest - Red LED
long_description: The lightweight, fashion-friendly Night Ize Sport Safety Vest is made with 3M(TM) Scotchlite(TM) reflective material and features 2 illuminated flexible polymer strips for visibility. Wear this vest when you're heading out for a run or ride in the dark for a comfortable, effective way to ensure you'll be highly visible to traffic in front of and behind you. Universally sized with easily adjustable hook and loop at the waist, the Night Ize Sport Safety Vest is easy to slip on and off. Power/mode buttons are easily accessible on the front and back of the vest; elastic sections with rip-and-stick closure allow adjustment at the waist for a snug fit. 2 long-lasting, easy-to-replace 2032 3V lithium batteries (included) offer up to 100 hours of illumination. Bright red LED illuminated horizontal stripes and vertical 3M Scotchlite reflective material are located and the front and back of the vest. Red LED illumination features steady glow and flashing modes. Weather-resistant design and construction. The Night Ize Sport Safety Vest measures 20 x 14 x 0.37 in.
